title: Pantheon Devourer
body:
Why not build Pantheon with Devourers in the jungle and a build like

{{item:3726}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3143}} {{item:1304}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3102}} 

Or a full damage build

Passive 2 gud 5 me

"The following champions have 4-stack abilities which will proc every 2.6 attacks, ability casts aside: 
•Braum (Passive) (fixed, thanks /u/MolecularEntity!)
•Pantheon (Passive)
•Tristana (E - when active on enemy, possibly) (thanks /u/kittymmeow!)
•Twisted Fate (E)
•Master Yi (Passive)"-Reddit

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3b9bq9/champions_who_benefit_from_sated_devourer/

replies.body: No, just no, he has a LOCK-ON stun, his ganks are way too strong to be in the jungle farming the whole time

because it doesn't work with his passive, just like it doesn't work with gnar w

I tried them

Are you sure?

I wouldn't go it because Pantheon has strong early ganks and you're setting this back a lot by taking devourer's, where Warriors will give you a lot more damage plus the CDR helps a lot too.

He can clear faster, kill faster and this helps him snowball because he's not that strong late-game.
and im saying it wouldn't do anything for him... Warrior would obv be better
